name: Resilience
effects: Cure Sleep, Silence, Poison, Petrify, Paralyze, Disease, Confusion and Blind for self
Increase resistance to all status effects by 100% for self for 2 turns

desc_short: Cure and temporarily gain immunity to poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for caster

사용자의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 회복+일시적 저항력 상승

desc_long: Cures and temporarily gains immunity to poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for caster.
治療發動者中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化的狀態並暫時提高耐性。
사용자의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화를 회복하고 일시적으로 저항력이 상승합니다.
Soigne et de gagne une immunité temporaire contre poison, cécité, sommeil, paralysie, confusion, maladie, et pétrification pour le lanceur.
Heilung und vorübergehende Immunität gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein für Benutzer.
Cura e inmuniza al usuario contra veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad y piedra
